name: Strawberry Bread
author: Anna Rose Bles

ingredients.name: (10 oz.) frozen or 3 c. fresh berries

instructions: Mix the berries, eggs and oil together. Blend in rest of ingredients. Pour into 2 loaf greased and floured pans or greased pans with waxed paper. Bake at 350Â° for 1 to 1 1?2 hours. Top with strawberry butter.
